card.name: CW - GCCW100 - Amend cases on old system

data.text: @gillianoberholzer It seems like the incorrect case numbers supplied are incorrect. If I do a search on case number 119304/2012 I don't get Adelanto Properties CC. And in order for me to correct the case numbers, I need to search on the incorrect number and then match up the names and then update the record.
